xuiActionDrawer
directive in module xui

Description

Implementation of xui horizontal sliding menu with actions

Usage

as element:
<xui-action-drawer
       items-source="{array}"
       'left="{string}">
</xui-action-drawer>

Parameters

ParamTypeDetails
items-sourcearray

Array of items to be displayed in the menu slider.

'leftstring

| right' position-direction To specify menu's sliding direction.

Example

Source
